com.module.interaction

类 ReaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.module.interaction.ReaderHelper
  • 直接已知子类:
    RFIDReaderHelper

    public abstract class ReaderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to operate all the modules.This class include the read and write functions to module. You can receive the data via implementation #DataPackageParser.Via method sendCommand(byte[]) send data to module.Reference setReader(InputStream, OutputStream, DataPackageParser, DataPackageProcess)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReaderHelper

        public ReaderHelper()
        Constructor

    • 方法详细资料

      • setReader

        public void setReader(java.io.InputStream in,
                      java.io.OutputStream out,
                      DataPackageParser parser,
                      DataPackageProcess process)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the InputStream(read module data) , OutputStream(write data to module),DataPackageParser( Parser raw data returned by module to data package according to the module protocol. Then transmit the data package to DataPackageProcess) and DataPackageProcess(Process the data package to get different information).
        参数:
        in - Input stream of module.
        out - Output stream of module.
        parser - parse the data returned by module.
        process - process the data package parsed by parser
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw an error when in or out is empty

      • registerObserver

        public void registerObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        Update the data when have new data return.You can listener the notification if new data return by reader via register Observer.
        参数:
        observer - Register it to observable to listener the return data.

      • unRegisterObserver

        public void unRegisterObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        UnRegister the Observer.
        参数:
        observer - Unregister it to observable to stop listener the return data.

      • unRegisterObservers

        public void unRegisterObservers()
        UnRegister all the Observers;

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Judge the listener Thread is alive or not.
        返回:
        if true the thread is run,or the thread exit.

      • startWith

        public void startWith()
        You can invoke this method restart the connection if the connection missing.

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Exit the listener thread ,release the resource.

      • setRXTXListener

        public void setRXTXListener(RXTXListener listener)
        Set RXTX listener to listen sending data to reader,receiving data from reader and the connection missing.
        参数:
        listener - the interface RXTXListener} implementation class will invoke according event method.

      • sendCommand

        public int sendCommand(byte[] btCMDPackage)
        Send data to the reader.
        参数:
        btCMDPackage - the data package send to reader.
        返回:
        Succeeded :0, Failed:-1
